MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool NotifyScriptLoaded { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.NotifyScriptLoaded : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("NotifyScriptLoaded is no longer required in script references.")

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the object automatically adds code at the end of the ECMAScript (JavaScript) file to call the client method of the [Sys.Application](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cd901c0f-51e2-4c63-9963-158f4a88b008) class.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the object automatically adds code at the end of the ECMAScript (JavaScript) file to call the client method of the [Sys.Application](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cd901c0f-51e2-4c63-9963-158f4a88b008) class.

value.span: Wenn [Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd95aa94-34bb-45b6-ac06-1cb4031469c6) -Methode automatisch am Ende einer JavaScript-Datei aufgerufen oder Benutzercode [Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded] aufgerufen (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd95aa94-34bb-45b6-ac06-1cb4031469c6) Methode, die bereits in der JavaScript-Datei.

span.span: if the [Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd95aa94-34bb-45b6-ac06-1cb4031469c6) method is automatically called at the end of a JavaScript file, or if user code calls the [Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd95aa94-34bb-45b6-ac06-1cb4031469c6) method that is already in the JavaScript file.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Legen Sie die Eigenschaft `false` Wenn Sie eine Skriptdatei in einer Assembly verweisen und die Skriptdatei bereits Code zum Aufrufen enthält [Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd95aa94-34bb-45b6-ac06-1cb4031469c6).Set the property to `false` if you reference a script file in an assembly and the script file already contains code to call [Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd95aa94-34bb-45b6-ac06-1cb4031469c6). Ein Fehler wird ausgelöst, wenn [Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd95aa94-34bb-45b6-ac06-1cb4031469c6) Methode mehr als einmal aufgerufen wird, aus einer Skriptdatei.An error is thrown if [Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd95aa94-34bb-45b6-ac06-1cb4031469c6) method is called more than one time from a script file. Wenn Sie eine eigenständige Skriptdatei, die nicht in einer Assembly eingebettet ist verweisen, müssen Sie Code am Ende der Skriptdatei zum Aufrufen Einfügen der [Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd95aa94-34bb-45b6-ac06-1cb4031469c6) Methode.If you reference a standalone script file that is not embedded in an assembly, you must include code at the end of the script file to call the [Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd95aa94-34bb-45b6-ac06-1cb4031469c6) method. Das folgende Beispiel zeigt den Code am Ende der Skriptdatei enthalten.The following example shows the code to include at the end of the script file. ``` if(typeof(Sys) !== "undefined) Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded(); ```

span.span: The full path of the script to rename.
The path must end with ".js".

summary.span: Replaces the file-name extension in the specified script path to designate a debug script.

span.span: Replaces the file-name extension in the specified script path to designate a debug script.

returns.span: A string that contains the path of the script with the debug extension.

span.span: A string that contains the path of the script with the debug extension.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Diese Methode wird davon ausgegangen, dass das Skript die Erweiterung ". js" hat.This method assumes that the script has a ".js" extension. Klicken Sie dann die Erweiterung mit ersetzt ". debug.js".It then replaces the extension with ".debug.js".
